int scan_d()    {int ip=getchar_unlocked(),ret=0;for(;ip<'0'||ip>'9';ip=getchar_unlocked());for(;ip>='0'&&ip<='9';ip=getchar_unlocked())ret=ret*10+ip-'0';return ret;}

//main

int main()
{
    int t;
    t=scan_d();
    while(t--)
    {
        int n=scan_d();
        int k=scan_d();
        int arr[n];
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
            arr[i]=scan_d();
        sort(arr,arr+n);
        long long sum=0;
        while(k)
            sum+=arr[n-(k--)];
        printf("%lld\n",sum);
    }
    return 0;
}
